channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #184, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/07 and 11/15
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #184, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/07 and 11/15. You’ll find that last week has seen the start of quite some interesting crowdfundings to check out. In another regards I included a new icon – the crying star: star – which is reserved for projects I would have backed, yet the creators don’t offer shipping to Germany. English Crowdfundings 3 Roleplaying Games 2 Cyberpunk & SF Roleplaying Games 2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 2 Pulp Roleplaying Games 1 Solo Roleplaying Game 1 Gamebook 4 Settings 2 Sourcebooks 2 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 3 Adventures 2 D&D 5E Adventures 4 Dice Projects 1 Coin Project 1 Soundscape 1 Enamel Pin 1 Larp 1 Other game French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 1 Deck of Cards Italian Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/11/16/crowdfunding-collection-184/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #184, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/07 and 11/15
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #184, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/07 and 11/15.

You’ll find that last week has seen the start of quite some interesting crowdfundings to check out.
In another regards I included a new icon – the crying star: star – which is reserved for projects I would have backed, yet the creators don’t offer shipping to Germany.

English Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
2 Cyberpunk & SF Roleplaying Games
2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Pulp Roleplaying Games
1 Solo Roleplaying Game
1 Gamebook
4 Settings
2 Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
3 Adventures
2 D&D 5E Adventures
4 Dice Projects
1 Coin Project
1 Soundscape
1 Enamel Pin
1 Larp
1 Other game

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
1 Deck of Cards

Italian Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/11/16/crowdfunding-collection-184/
